org.agorava.api.service

Interface OAuthLifeCycleService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface OAuthLifeCycleService
extends Serializable
    Main entry point for Agorava. This class manages the OAuth initialization phase ("OAuth dance") and the lifecycle of the OAuthSession collections for a given .UserSessionRepository
    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand

        void killSession(OAuthSession session)
        kill (disconnect and garbage) the given session
        Parameters:

      • getCurrentUserProfileService

        UserProfileService getCurrentUserProfileService()
        Returns:
        the service needed to retrieve user profile for the given provider

      • startDanceFor

        String startDanceFor(String providerName)
        OAuth Dance entry point. For a given Provider name initialize OAuth workflow by returning authorization url end user should connect to in order to grant permission to the OAuth application to use her account or her behalf
        Parameters:
        providerName - name of the service provider to connect to
        Returns:
        the Authorization url needed to continue the OAuth Dance workflow

      • startDanceFor

        String startDanceFor(String providerName,
                   String internalCallBack)
        OAuth Dance entry point. For a given Provider name initialize OAuth workflow by returning authorization url end user should connect to in order to grant permission to the OAuth application to use her account or her behalf
        Parameters:
        providerName - name of the service provider to connect to
        internalCallBack - the internal URL to go back to after ending the dance
        Returns:
        the Authorization url needed to continue the OAuth Dance workflow

      • startDanceFor

        String startDanceFor(Annotation provider)
        OAuth dance entry point. For a given Provider ProviderRelated qualifier, initializes OAuth workflow by returning authorization url end user should connect to in order to grant permission to the OAuth application to use her account or her behalf
        Parameters:
        provider - qualifier with ProviderRelated meta annotation
        Returns:
        the Authorization url needed to continue the OAuth Dance workflow

      • endDance

        void endDance(String verifier)
        OAuth dance exit point. After visiting the URL returned by startDanceFor
        Parameters:
        verifier - the verifier or code value returned in callback by provider service to validate final

      • endDance

        void endDance()
        OAuth dance exit point. This version is used when activating session with existing Access Token

      • buildSessionFor

        OAuthSession buildSessionFor(String providerName)
        Build a new OAuth Session for the given provider name and set it as current
        Parameters:
        providerName - name of the provider to build the session for
        Returns:
        the new session

      • buildSessionFor

        OAuthSession buildSessionFor(Annotation qualifier)
        Build a new OAuth Session for the given provider qualifier and set it as current
        Parameters:
        qualifier - qualifier of the provider to build the session for
        Returns:
        the new session

      • resolveSessionForQualifier

        OAuthSession resolveSessionForQualifier(Annotation qualifier)
                                        throws ProviderMismatchException
        Resolve session for the given qualifier.
        • If the current session is NULL, build a new session, set it as current an return it
        • If the current session is not NULL and has the same qualifier, return it
        • Otherwise throw an exception
        Parameters:
        qualifier - provider ProviderRelated qualifier
        Returns:
        a session having the qualifier provided
        Throws:
        ProviderMismatchException - if current session is not NULL and its qualifier is different than the one provided

      • getVerifierParamName

        String getVerifierParamName()
        return the name of the parameter for the verifier (OAuth 1.0a) or code (OAuth 2.0) returned by the provider in the callback
        Returns:
        parameter name

      • getAllActiveSessions

        List<OAuthSession> getAllActiveSessions()
        Returns:
        all active session (connected session) in the current UserSessionRepository

      • setCurrentSession

        void setCurrentSession(OAuthSession session)
        Makes the given OAuth session the current session
        Parameters:
        session - to put as current session
